known_issues: New image update did not work (image failed to apply/render as expected)

existing_features.title: Fix the Today page hero background image so the new asset "Untitled design (33).png" reliably loads and renders as the hero background in the "Current Nakshatra Placement" section (no broken image/404), including handling special characters in the filename (spaces/parentheses) and ensuring the file is present in the correct frontend static assets location.

Reposition the hero overlay text content in the Today page hero (glyph, "Current Nakshatra Placement" heading, and subtitle) so it sits in the bottom lower third of the hero image area instead of centered, while keeping it readable (spacing/padding) across mobile and desktop.

new_feature_requests.summary: Position overlay text in the bottom lower third of the image

projectName: Fix Today hero image loading and move hero text to bottom lower third
